headerDesc.timeRange: Drop table changed; Data in this row only includes information from last change, "Time Range."
headerDesc.clearTime: Shortest possible time to clear stage, i.e. time elapsed from the beginning of combat to the last enemy's appearance. Data source: [PRTS Wiki]({prtsLink}).
headerDesc.patternPercentage: Probability of obtaining drop pattern calculated as (Loots / Samples).
headerDesc.itemPerTime: "Percentage" calculated. Time required to obtain 1 item, expected, calculated as (ClearTime / (Loots / Samples)).
headerDesc.apPPR: Sanity required, expected for obtaining 1x of this item.

generating.title: Generating Site Statistics...
generating.subtitle: Neural Network Message: Site statistics require up to 5 minutes to calculate due to high data volume. Please return later.

dialog.subtitle: Reset planner data and settings with this operation. Confirm to proceed?

import.unrecognized: Unable to recognize config file. Import, failed.
import.invalidJSON: Input, invalid JSON. Please check. Import, failed.

notices.autoExistence: ArkPlanner, now hides non-existent stages automatically.

DropAreaDrops::LowConfidence.title: Item, drop with low confidence.
DropAreaDrops::LowConfidence.subtitle: Check screenshot, closed event included in content?

Droptypes::Illegal.title: Illegal drop type
Droptypes::Illegal.subtitle: Screenshot contains illegal drop types, e.g. first-clear or return AP.

StageChar::LowConfidence.subtitle: Recognition result has low confidence. Check if it matches the screenshot.
StageChar::LowConfidence.title: Stage recognition, error.

DropAreaDrops::Illegal.subtitle: No drop expected in this stage, but screenshot shows drops. Event drop during non-event period, usually the cause.
DropAreaDrops::Illegal.title: Illegal drops found

DropAreaDropsQuantity::NotFound.title: Quantity of drop, not recognized, failed.
DropAreaDropsQuantity::NotFound.subtitle: Problem caused by low-resolution, low-quality pictures. Check if image compressed.

Result::False.title: Either not a result screenshot for battle, or internal error occurred.
Result::False.subtitle: Battle result screenshot, correct server selected — confirm!

DropQuantityChar::LowConfidence.title: Item quantity recognition, error.
DropQuantityChar::LowConfidence.subtitle: Recognition result, low confidence. Check if consistent with screenshot.

Stage::NotFound.title: No valid matching stage found.
Stage::NotFound.subtitle: Stage recognition error or drop not counted for this stage.

Fingerprint::Same.title: Duplicated Images
Fingerprint::Same.subtitle: Check, duplicated images selected by you.

report.partialFailed: {count} failed battle result reports. Troubleshoot with steps below.
report.caption: Report received. Data will appear in global dataset of website in no more than 20 minutes due to cache. Thank you.
report.title: Report Details
report.partialFailedDesc:
Check network connection. Poor connection may cause upload failure.
To prevent external attacks on the entire data set, if multiple retries fail, your submission volume may have reached the reporting limit. Try again in 24 hours to upload remaining drop reports.
IP may be shared, as individuals cannot be located by IP. Switch mobile network or WiFi and retry recognition, or retry uploading in 24 hours.
To prevent retransmission attacks, a timestamp will be attached to your request. If device time is too far from standard, upload may fail. Calibrate device time and try again.

dialog.title: Recognition defect feedback, send.
dialog.subtitle: Recognition defect feedback, send to us. Include screenshot image, recognition result, environment info (current UI version, recognition core version, recognition resource version). We will use your feedback to optimize the screenshot recognition algorithm. Thank you for helping us improve the recognition feature!

snackbar.succeeded: Feedback, regarding recognition defects, submitted. Appreciate your feedback!
snackbar.failed: Recognition defect feedback, submission failed. Try again later.

tips.copyImage: Image, to share, right click or long press.
tips.chooseImage: Add image by clicking or dragging.
tips.abnormal: Count, {count}, images "excluded." Reason, failed legibility test, or recognition failure.

notices.confirm: Click the image for double-checking. Legible screenshots selected for upload. Not allowed to upload unclear screenshots for dataset accuracy.
notices.welcome:
Image files, recognized **locally**, with use of **WebAssembly** technology. No image uploads to server.
Screenshots, taken within 36 hours, only with 3-stars clear. Duplications marked as *excluded*.
Do not report first-clears or lucky clears, report all clears.

recognition.description: Select a settlement page screenshot. Automatically identify and upload all drop results. Simple.

report.gacha: Singular report, multiple results allowed for this stage.
report.usage: Left click, increase drop amount. Right click, decrease.

causes.limitation: Report shows significant discrepancy with current data. Continuing submission may result in flagging as outlier, and exclusion from statistical data.

contact.after: Indicate stage name and drops. Screenshot preferred for verification. Our team marks report after verification.
contact.before: Sure you got this drop in-game? Submit report.

report.name: Report

closedReason.INVALID: Report, unable to. No drop reporting metadata in this stage.
closedReason.EXPIRED: Reportable Time Range not met. Stage either closed or not yet opened.
closedReason.NOT_FOUND: Stage, not found. Server selected, lacks existence of stage.

notices.rule_5: Submit drop data, only from CN server.
notices.rule_2: No drops, submit directly without selecting any drops.
notices.rule_3: First-clears not to be reported. All clears, including the ones with luck, must be reported.
notices.rule_1: Clear, report one at a time. Drop selection, double-check, please.

quickStart.title: Quick Start
quickStart.caption:
Expand menu, see more features. Click
button.

intro.intro_3: Report, Dataset Invalidation Transparency, planned for implementation. Purpose: to ensure dataset transparency and list dataset changes.
intro.intro_2: Penguin Statistics dataset, current, combination of player reports, screenshot recognition, and tool uploads via public APIs for maintenance. Penguin Statistics team performs various types of maintenance, including automatic, scheduled, and manual methods, to ensure accuracy of dataset.
intro.intro_1: Penguin Statistics, Data Analysis Department of Penguin Logistics (jokingly). We dedicate ourselves to analyzing item drops.

contribute.contribute_0: You, experienced with these skills? Want to contribute to Penguin Statistics? Join our Discord, or our QQ group: 747099627.
contribute.newFolder: Working hard, creating project repo currently...
contribute.caption: Penguin Statistics, is a community project. We are non-profit. Joint maintenance and support are required from all. We welcome you to visit our GitHub. Give us a star, and provide feedback and suggestions through Issues. Issues and PRs, welcomed anytime!

item.title: Choose Item
item.subtitle: Filter query results by specified materials. When one filter is selected, no other filters can be chosen for the same query. Want to filter other parameters? Add a comparison query.

timeRange.subtitle: Specific time range, limit query results (required).
timeRange.title: Choose Time Range

stage.title: Choose Stage
stage.subtitle: Filter query results, specify materials. Only one filter can be selected per query. To filter other parameters, add a comparison query.

footer.cache: Displayed query results, cached data. To acquire the latest data, please "execute query" again.
footer.disclaimer: Data by "Advanced Query" is protected by our site's "License." Commitments and endorsements by Penguin Statistics, regarding data produced by Advanced Query, are not made.

result.empty: No results found for query. Check parameters, please.

failed.title: Resources, failed to be fetched.
failed.subtitle: Connection, synchronized, with neural network, unable to establish. Missing partial or all resources.
failed.deploying: Maintenance, in progress. Bear with us while we deploy latest version.

chunk.title: Level 2 neural network, establishing connection...
chunk.subtitle: Fetching page modules, rendering view. Please wait...

copyright.content: Drop rate statistics collected by Penguin Statistics, licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International License. To redistribute content on this site, credit Penguin Statistics as the source with a link to this site. Commercial use of content or derivatives strictly prohibited without permission.
copyright.title: License

confirmLeave.title: Leave this page, are you sure?
confirmLeave.subtitle: Unsaved changes, may be lost.

automated.tooltip: Matrix Category, Auto. Data from third-party tools, reports drop data automatically, contained within.
automated.label: Auto

manual.tooltip: Manual: Data in Such Matrix Category from Penguin Statistics site's "Report Drops by Stage" and "Report Drops by Recognition" features only.
manual.label: Manual

reset.title: Reset All
reset.subtitle: Delete all local data and settings. After deletion, settings will reset to default, data must be downloaded again, and web page will reload. Continue?

lowData.title: Low Data Mode
lowData.subtitle: Low Data Mode, reduce network data use by stopping fetching nonessential resources, like zone backgrounds in stage selector and website background.

settings.storageIssue: Storage issues detected. Malfunction possible. If warning persists, clear local storage using "Reset All" in "Settings" dialog under menu.

material.content:
Penguin Statistics, use various game resources (like pictures, animations, audio, original text, and translations) to reflect game elements and enhance user experience. Copyright for these resources, belong to Shanghai Hypergryph Network Technology Co., Ltd. and/or its affiliates, which include YOSTAR (HONG KONG) LIMITED, 株式会社Yostar, YOSTAR LIMITED, 龍成網路, and others.
Penguin Statistics, utilize assets from PRTS Wiki [http://prts.wiki] and modify some without changing their original meaning.
Penguin Statistics, use a slightly self-modified version of the Bender font, provided by the Free Fonts Project ([http://jovanny.ru]) under the Project's claimed usage basis on its official website. Penguin Statistics, express gratitude to the Free Fonts Project and the licenses it uses, for their openness.
